dcterms:creator: M. Everingham

dcterms:description: The Pascal VOC 2012 dataset contains 10,582 images in the training split and 1,449 in the validation split, with each pixel assigned to one of 21 different classes (20 plus background).
dcterms:title: Pascal VOC2012

dcterms:creator: Bolei Zhou
Hang Zhao
Xavier Puig
Sanja Fidler
Adela Barriuso
Antonio Torralba
dcterms:description: The ADE20K dataset is a large-scale dataset containing 22,210 images, with 2,000 forming the validation split. It includes 150 classes representing both stuff (e.g., sky, building) and object classes (e.g., bottle, chair).
dcterms:title: ADE20K
